author: Simon Difford
description: This delicate drink demands freshly pressed apple juice and flavoursome Scotch with subtle peat.
name: GE Blonde
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
